segments.text: I see the woman standing there, so focused on the plate she’s drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already in that puddle, but she doesn’t seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps pouring over the sink like time slipping through her fingers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but wonder if she feels overwhelmed by all the tasks in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, however, are up to something mischievous just behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is definitely reaching for those cookies like it’s the most exciting thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, her little hand outstretched, anticipating a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a twinge of anxiety watching that stool wobble under the boy’s weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? The consequences could be disastrous for them all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, there’s a certain thrill in their secret mission, isn’t there?
segments.speaker: PAR
